availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, grocer. Native of Oldenburg, Germany. Married to Mary Bernadina “Dina” Middendorf in Kenton County on May 5, 1857. Father of John Ostendorf, Mary Ostendorf, Bernard Ostendorf, and Bernard H. Ostendorf. Grocer in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 678.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 204A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058: Kenton County Marriages, p. 16.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll # 7012984: Covington Deaths, Certificates 1-723 (1897), certificate #47, p. 60 of microfilm.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Kenton County Wills, Vol 7-8, 1896-1903), p. 104 of microfilm (Accessed through ancestry.com on April 1, 2020.
_Find A Grave, "Johann Ostendorf (1833-1897)," Memorial 97079755, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97079755 (accessed April 1, 2020).
